fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot someone during the night.
- Shoot someone during the day, but they will not appear dead until they are hanged or visited. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Kills are resolved as soon as the host sees the action.
- If the target dies at night, they may not perform their night ability.
- Hanging a corpse will not end the day.
